title: "We've disabled Rengar due to an in-game bug"
body:
Guess we know who's the better hunter now

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/fg5ykQEYpEY/maxresdefault.jpg

replies.body: This belongs in the "Report a Bug" section.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Not when the champion in question portrais a mantis, which is an insect. ;)

looks like a mantis..is not a mantis...

Riot classified it as a bug

it is a bug. 

belongs in bug section.

Poor insect, placed in the bug section...he's gonna be outed like a rat.

Well, as long I won't have to face a feral cat in the brush, I'm happy with it. ^^
Just give the honor to Caitlyn for it even happening:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_V27xGRRUdM
Kha'Zix finally got rengar aparently
{{champion:121}}  should now be able to get all evolved skills without upgrading ult since he is the bestest hunter.

When Kha'zix gets buffed 90% of all patches

When Rengar gets a big nerf on 6.2 and a slight buff 6.3 and is STILL better than Kha'zix

S-4 Kha Zix (before the nerfs) >>>>>>>>>>> S-4 Lee Sin/Rengar

if kha ever gets buffed enough to make him a bit good as he once was, i'm returning to main him ASAP

rengar nerfs were just to let the kitty play with his food, the victims now can TRY to escape

Why not main him now and see how the new masteries made him?

He seems decent, although he's still squishy.  Waiting for rito to give him another R passive or something to make him spammable. =d
No but reduce isolation area by 30-40% so targets get isolated faster. That would help a lot. Basically you can tune Khazix by just tuning his isolation radius.
If isolation gets buffed I'd rather have it be damage ;p
His isolation damage is ridiculous enough already. The only problem is he can never get someone isolated.

And season 3 khazix was even better. 

Ah the good ol' days of divebombing _Everything_.
http://www.40kforums.com/vb/attachment.php?attachmentid=12581
R U HIGH? Kha has always been more powerful, especially lategmae...he jsut takes a little bit mroe time to master and so most ppl who play kha are bad..

the only people who have higher then a 50% winrate on rengar are people who have played over 125 games. So i dont know what you mean by "kha zix is harder to master". The reason most people dont play kha zix is not because he is harder, but because he is not as fun play style wise.

I was abotu to say that's not true then I realized yea I have a close to 70% winrate on rengar but I've porbably played like 300 somehting games wiht him...so yeah. Both champs are balanced though. 
Seriously tho my rengar winrate should be 75% I have wayyy too many defeats where I finished wiht more than 25 kills and less tahn 15 deaths...
It could have been another bug that Rekt'd him. {{champion:421}}

It was a bug that allowed him 100% cdr on E and W until he auto attacked. He could walking to a walk and just Bola the enemy over and over and over for a constant slow and damage. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aJX-oK5npns


EDIT: I did make a slight mistake; It's 100% cdr until he gains max ferocity and uses the empowered charge again. My bad!{{champion:107}}

> It was a bug that allowed him 100% cdr on E and W until he auto attacked. He could walking to a walk and just Bola the enemy over and over and over for a constant slow and damage. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aJX-oK5npns

OOOOHHH
Daddy likey
TBH I kind of like the bola spam and would totally give up the snare on E to troll people with more bolas.

> [{quoted}](name=Hunstoppable,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=xEz5x2uY,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-27T11:13:37.989+0000)
>
> TBH I kind of like the bola spam and would totally give up the snare on E to troll people with more bolas.

You like E bola spam???
HOW DARE YA? 
You sir deserve a ban
I got Ebola from this
"we've disabled rengar because one of the riot'ers is an ad carry and is sick of this bullshit"
thats alien from AvP

1) No.
2) If it was, it would be Alien from Alien, AvP is a glorified spinoff.

AvP is what got me INTO alien.  

While it may be a spinoff, it is still a wonderful movie.
I bet there is a huge smile on the faces of adc mains.....oh wait.....there still is zed, and yasuo, and khazix, and talon.......and.....a whole lot. Nvm.
Yes, but they take 2 seconds to kill you, not 0.025.
http://i.imgur.com/kwKOGZo.png I forget why I made this, but I still have this for some reason.
Fiora is no longer disabled now? fuuuuuuuu

"We've temporarily disabled Aatrox due to an in-game bug", "we've temporarily disabled Rengar due to an in-game bug", "we've temporarily disabled Fiora due to an in-game bug"...can we please have some clarity(™) here, and be told what the bug is?

The affected champion(s) have been disabled, so we can't reproduce the bug or exploit it in any way anyway, so what's the harm?
Rengar's bug gave him 100% CDR on his E and W. He could just walk to lanes for infinate slows, snares, aoe damage, and heals. Pretty fuckin funny
I think what's funnier is those two lines have him saying so many things. "EASY PREY. DON'T TRIP. COME ON. LET'S FIGHT. EASY PREY."

Oh, that bad, huh. Yeah, that sounds really nice indeed. Rito, plz. :\

Personally, I just want the mana pots back. It's hard to play Kennen and other non-mana champions without enough mana.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/1pzfata260ojgf0/League%20of%20Legends%202015-10-24%2021-18-35-01%20-%20kennen%20no%20mana_.jpg?dl=0
'' due to an in-game bug ''   '' bug '' lmfao
This joke is older than the league itself
Get rekt.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I love you guys...
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
This has been bugging me for a while- which champion is that an icon of? Is it jinx?
Me too. People thought I was crazy seeing Vi.
Kha Zix is a pretentious Zerg wannabe. Rengar however is the true hunter
{{champion:64}}  Blind Lee #1
